author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND APPROACHING BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...HEAVY RAINS AND TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED THERE ON SATURDAY...
summary: ...RAYMOND APPROACHING BAJA CALIFORNIA SUR... ...HEAVY RAINS AND TROPICAL STORM CONDITIONS EXPECTED THERE ON SATURDAY... As of 11:00 PM MST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 20.5, -108.5 with movement NW at 17 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
